title.rendered: Nolinor Aviation in Montreal, Quebec, Canada

content.rendered:
Nolinor Aviation, is a charter airline based in Mirabel, a suburb of Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It operates passenger charter and cargo services within Canada and to the U.S. The airline was established in 1992 and started operations in 1997.

 

Nolinor Aviation in Montreal, Quebec, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 11600 Rue Louis Bisson, Mirabel, QC J7N 1G9, Canada

Phone: 450 476-0018
Booking: 1 888 505-7025

Fax: 450 476-0199

Email: marketing@nolinor.com
HR
rh@nolinor.com
Lost objects
mirabel@nolinor.com

Working hours: NA

Nolinor Aviation Official website: https://nolinor.com/en/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Nolinor Aviation

Total fleet: 18

  • Boeing 737-200
  • Boeing 737 Classic
  • Convair 340
  • Convair 580
  • Hughes 500
  • Learjet 31
  • Learjet 45

Queries handled by Nolinor Aviation Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Nolinor Aviation in Montreal, Quebec, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Nolinor Aviation in Montreal, Quebec, Canada: (click on the stars below)
